**Disadvantage** allows the *GM* to choose **one** dice from the test or check to reroll. The *GM* chooses to use old or new value.
**Advantage** allows the player to choose **one** dice from the test or check to reroll. The new value must be used.
**Quick items** can be used on the exploration phase without spending a turn, or in combat, using 1 action.
**Slow items** cannot be used in combat, using them in the exploration phase will spend 1 turn.
**Camp items** may only be used during the camping phase or interlude.

Step.name: Tossed in the Pit
Step.description: Rejected by everyone, even by death.

Step.name: Feral Kid
Step.description: Raised by animals in the forest.

Step.name: Born in Exile
Step.description: Raised far away from civilization.

Step.name: Battleborn
Step.description: Born in a army during a raging war, forged in violence.

Step.name: Street Urchin
Step.description: Orphan, raised by other kids.

Step.name: City Kid
Step.description: Grew up amidst the chaos of a big city.

Step.name: Caravan Child
Step.description: Born in a trading caravan, before walking you learned to haggle.

Step.name: Clergy Bastard
Step.description: Born by a sinful union, learned guilt and prayer before walking.

Step.name: Occultistâ€™s Apprentice
Step.description: Raised by an occultist and trained in the arcane arts since a kid.

Step.name: Blue Blood
Step.description: Born in a rich family that eventually lost everything.

Step.name: Born of a dark prophecy
Step.description: No one knows where you came from, only that it's bad.

Step.name: Deserter Knight
Step.description: To die for honor was never something you aspired to.

Step.name: Squire
Step.description: They said one day you will a a knight. You believed that.

Step.name: Physician
Step.description: Not many people knows how to actually heal someone, you do.

Step.name: Temple Worker
Step.description: You worked hard in the temples, body and mind.

Step.name: Charlatan
Step.description: Outsmarting and taking advantage was your specialty.

Step.name: Brigand
Step.description: Joined a gang that robs people on the mountains and forests.

Step.name: Common Thief
Step.description: Stealing, lying and hiding.

Step.name: Craftsman
Step.description: You hands know how to hammer an iron and how to sew leather without you even thinking.

Step.name: Cook
Step.description: While there is hungry people you will always have a job.

Step.name: Occultist
Step.description: One that dares to touch the unknown, a magic user.

Step.name: False Prophet
Step.description: It's hard not to believe in yourself when so many believe in what you say.

Step.name: Forced to work on a circus
Step.description: The things you've seen behind the curtains changed you forever.

Step.name: Afflicted by the plague
Step.description: You had to resort to treatment many would consider... unnatural.

Step.name: A murderous impulse
Step.description: Something was wrong with you, but you are better now. Unlike yor victims.

Step.name: In debt with a loan shark
Step.description: You got the money that you needed, but it costed more than you expected.

Step.name: Lost to the night pleasures
Step.description: One party blended into the next, until the day came and your young years were gone.

Step.name: Enlisted in a war
Step.description: Fought in the losing side of a glorious war.

Step.name: Went to jail
Step.description: By reasons just or unjust, you ended up locked away.

Step.name: Enslaved
Step.description: Taken by force and worked endlessly until the day you escaped.

Step.name: Lost everything in a disaster
Step.description: Whatever your family had, now lie in ashes.

Step.name: Lover's revenge
Step.description: Too many lovers and no honesty. One way or another, they made you regret it.

Step.name: Caged by a powerful wizard
Step.description: You witnessed both enlightenment and madness.

Step.name: Lost everything and everyone
Step.description: When you have lost everything, *Blacksalt* can be a fresh start or a quick end.

Step.name: Plagued loved one
Step.description: Rumors of a panacea, a cure for all diseases, lies in *Blacksalt*.

Step.name: An unexplainable impulse
Step.description: Something calls you there, when you sleep you see yourself in *Blacksalt*.

Step.name: Revenge
Step.description: You've been terribly wronged. You will never forgive and never forget.

Step.name: Fame and riches
Step.description: You are destined to great things, at least that's what you believe.
Step.effect: #Cape with your coat of arms(+1 AP)

Step.name: An impossible quest
Step.description: Your lord sent you on a quest to find something in *Blacksalt*, you have no chance.

Step.name: Redemption
Step.description: You can no longer live with the things you've done, maybe you can redeem yourself in *Blacksalt*.

Step.name: Zealous Fury
Step.description: *Blacksalt* must be cleansed of any diabolical presence, no matter the cost.

Step.name: Amnesia
Step.description: You don't know how you got here, you just woke up here one day, now you are searching for the truth.
Step.effect: #Book with notes in an unknown language

Step.name: An Heir
Step.description: Your family is waiting for you, you will come back for them. But first you need to score enough money.

Step.name: A Soul Sold
Step.description: You are going to hell, some say that in the depths of *Blacksalt* one can reclaim their soul.
